dmca.title: STORY THEFT
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 3:42:07 p.m.
(GMT-6) on October 27, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

 


________________________________

From: Aurora Black [mailto:aurora.supernova@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 25, 2006 9:20 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: STORY THEFT
Subject: Fwd: STORY THEFT


Since I was so rudely ignored before by the Abuse department...


A user of The Planet is posting stolen stories on six different
websites. He or she has copied my story, "Heart of the Dragon Ch. 02"
without my permission.

The original is located on Literotica.com:
http://english.literotica.com/stories/showstory.php?id=259157 

The stolen version is here:
http://xxlpenis.com/2006/09/30/heart_of_the_dragon_ch_02/ 
 
I hereby assert that my name is Serena White, that I am the author and
sole legal owner of this story, and that the The Planet user running the
website "xxlpenis.com" has committed an offense against the Section 501
of the United States Copyright Act and "the infringement may also
constitute a criminal misdemeanor or felony, which would be prosecuted
by the U.S. Department of Justice."

I expect immediate attention to this matter. You have 2 business days to
respond before I bring this to the attention of my attorney. 
 
Serena White
